item.description: I’m stoked to announce the launch of Hit - a command line tool to manage HTTP requests. Hit takes a command-line first approach to managing HTTP requests, executing them and sharing them with others. Demo-time # Nothing beats a demo! Why build a new tool? # I spend the majority of my time on the terminal and write backend software. To execute requests, I usually resort to curl or similar programs, which evolve into scripts - shell or python.
